oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Joe Hoppel airchecks - WCMS
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording contains various airchecks by Joe Hoppel (DJ), also featuring Christy Gibbs (announcer) and Darryl Hosack (announcer), on radio station WCMS (Hatteras, NC.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Christy Gibbs and Joe Hoppel talk -- WCMS jingle -- Joe Hoppel does an aircheck and introduces the next song -- Joe Hoppel talks about Ricky Skaggs and the Atlantic Timber Company (incomplete) -- Joe Hoppel does a weather forecast and introduces the next tune -- Joe Hoppel aircheck -- Joe Hoppel does a weather forecast and an upcoming public event -- Joe Hoppel advertises Sentry Food Mart (incomplete) -- Joe Hoppel and Darryl Hosack do a traffic update -- Hoppel talks about the police man in his hometown driving a garbage truck -- Hoppel talks about Harborfest and does an aircheck -- Hoppel talks about Tom T. Hall and introduces Christy Gibbs -- Gibbs talks (incomplete) -- Hoppel talks about the subject of Texas in the majority of country songs -- Hoppel does an aircheck and a weather forecast -- Hoppel talks about country songs have words like Texas and Blue in them -- Hoppel introduces the next tune -- Hoppel does an aircheck and introduces the next tune -- Hoppel does a weather forecast and does an aircheck -- Hoppel does an aircheck and introduces Darryl Hosack -- Hosack and Hoppel give away a Dummy of the Day award to a burglar from a news story -- Gibbs does a brief news update -- Hoppel does an aircheck and weather forecast -- Hoppel says happy birthday to a listener -- Hoppel introduces the next tune -- Hoppel introduces Gibbs -- Gibbs gives a news update (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hoppel, Joe;
